channel.title: Microsoft Teams Integration on
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft Teams Integration on

item.title: Microsoft Teams Connection
item.description: Requirements # Generate a Microsoft Teams channel Incoming WebHook Creating a Microsoft Teams Connection # Navigate to Microsoft Teams integrations by clicking the Microsoft Teams link on the integrations page. Begin creating a BluBracket Microsoft Teams connection by clicking the + CONNECTION button. Copy the Incoming WebHook URL generated in Microsoft Teams App Paste the Incoming WebHook URL into the token input and click TEST & SAVE.

item.title: Microsoft Teams Subscription
item.description: Requirements # Generate a Microsoft Teams channel Incoming WebHook Create a Microsoft Teams connection Creating a Microsoft Teams Subscription # Navigate to Microsoft Teams integrations by clicking the Microsoft Teams link on the integrations page Click the + SUBSCRIPTION button to begin the creation process. Choose a name for the subscription as well as the saved filters you would like the subscription to be based on.
